original: Berg, Claes Aron, överingenjör, Överum, f. 6/10/90 i Hemmesjö, Kro-nob. 1., av fabrikör Frans B. o. Christina NiHison. ;G. 28 m. Astrid Mag-nu&son. Barn: Gunnar f. 30. — Egen verksamhet i Aryd 16-26, ing. v. Över-ums bruk 26-32, överingenjör där fr. 32. Led. av tax:nd o. barnav:nd. RVO.
translated: Berg, Claes Aron, chief engineer, Överum, b. October 6, 1890 in Hemmesjö, Kro-nob 1, son of manufacturer Frans B. and Christina Nilsson; married on August 28, 19XX to Astrid Magnusson. Children: Gunnar b. 1930. He had his own business in Aryd from 1916-1926, was an engineer at Överums bruk from 1926-1932, and was chief engineer there from 1932. He was a member of the tax commission and child welfare board and was awarded the Royal Order of Vasa.
